title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
content:
I'm surprised nobody has made a topic for this yet, considering all the hype there has been about the book. I'm to get it on my hands tomorrow, but won't check this topic again until I've read the book, in fear of spoilers (not that you people do that anyways [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] ).

So, tell here your opinion about the book, and so on. I will once I've read it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
content:
I just saw it at the store earlier today... But I was just like "Eh, I don't want to spend $18 on a book right now..."
I'll buy it and read it eventually... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-potter.gif[/img] -Genius314

title: Re: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
content:
I never read ANY Harry Potter books nor saw the movies.

Don't really care. It didn't even interest me back when I was in Grade School.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
content:
I downloaded an eBook the other day and just finished it.

The book was amazing, a fantastic conclusion to the series. But wow, the epilogue really sucked.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
content: I've read a few of the books, but only found the fifth one to be enjoyable.  I was very unimpressed with the sixth, but I'll be reading this one at some point just to see how it ends.
Great book, really.... Although, I'm surprised so many people don't care about the series on this forum.  We used to be huge Potter fans.

title: Re: ..
content:
Quite agree with xtra -- the book was very good conclusion to the series, but the epilogue could've been better. It's my favourite book of the series, before this my favourite was the sixth.
